page.title: Do they agree to this plan? - {{ applicationName }}
page.errorTitle: Error: Do they agree to this plan? - {{ applicationName }}

mainHeading.title: Does {{ subject.givenName }} agree to this plan?
mainHeading.hint: {{ subject.givenName }} must answer this question, or you must record why {{ subject.givenName }} could not.

agreePlanOptions.couldNotAnswerHint: Share this plan with {{ subject.givenName }} next time you see them.
agreePlanOptions.couldNotAnswer: {{ subject.givenName }} could not answer this question

agree-plan-radio.isIn: Select if they agree to the plan, or that they could not answer this question

does-not-agree-details.isNotEmpty: Enter details about why they do not agree
does-not-agree-details.isOverCharacterLimit: Details on why they do not agree must be 4,000 characters or less
does-not-agree-details.maxLength: Details on why they do not agree must be 4,000 characters or less

could-not-answer-details.isNotEmpty: Enter details about why they could not answer
could-not-answer-details.isOverCharacterLimit: Details on why they could not agree must be 4,000 characters or less

notes-exceed-character-limit.isOverCharacterLimit: Notes must be 4,000 characters or less
notes-exceed-character-limit.isNotEmpty: Enter details about why they cannot answer
notes-exceed-character-limit.maxLength: Details on why they could not agree must be 4,000 characters or less

notes.maxLength: Notes must be 4,000 characters or less
